taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section arguti;species perfoliosus;

treatment.description: Differing from no. 197 in more erect habit; canes often lower and stouter, with frequent prickles; teeth of leaves sharper, narrower than long, the leaf-tips sharper and more prolonged; fruit 1.5 cm. thick.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Dry, often rocky soil, Essex Co. to Tompkins Co., N.Y.
